  • ä¸ºä»€ä¹ˆå­˜å‚¨å’Œæ¢å¤å‰¯æœ¬ä¼šè¿èƒŒå°è£…åŸåˆ™ï¼Ÿ
  • å¤‡å¿˜å½•æ¨¡å¼æ˜¯å¦‚ä½•åšåˆ°ä¸è¿èƒŒå°è£…åŸåˆ™çš„ï¼Ÿ

å‡è®¾æœ‰è¿™æ ·ä¸€é“é¢è¯•é¢˜ï¼Œå¸Œæœ›ä½ ç¼–å†™ä¸€ä¸ªå°ç¨‹åºï¼Œå¯ä»¥æ¥æ”¶å‘½ä»¤è¡Œçš„è¾“å…¥ã€‚ç”¨æˆ·è¾“å…¥æ–‡æœ¬æ—¶ï¼Œç¨‹åºå°†å…¶è¿½åŠ å­˜å‚¨åœ¨å†…å­˜æ–‡æœ¬ä¸­ï¼›ç”¨æˆ·è¾“å…¥â€œ:listâ€ï¼Œç¨‹åºåœ¨å‘½ä»¤è¡Œä¸­è¾“å‡ºå†…å­˜æ–‡æœ¬çš„å†…å®¹ï¼›ç”¨æˆ·è¾“å…¥â€œ:undoâ€ï¼Œç¨‹åºä¼šæ’¤é”€ä¸Šä¸€æ¬¡è¾“å…¥çš„æ–‡æœ¬ï¼Œä¹Ÿå°±æ˜¯ä»å†…å­˜æ–‡æœ¬ä¸­å°†ä¸Šæ¬¡è¾“å…¥çš„æ–‡æœ¬åˆ é™¤æ‰ã€‚

æˆ‘ä¸¾äº†ä¸ªå°ä¾‹å­æ¥è§£é‡Šä¸€ä¸‹è¿™ä¸ªéœ€æ±‚ï¼Œå¦‚ä¸‹æ‰€ç¤ºï¼š

æ€ä¹ˆæ¥ç¼–ç¨‹å®ç°å‘¢ï¼Ÿä½ å¯ä»¥æ‰“å¼€IDEè‡ªå·±å…ˆè¯•ç€ç¼–å†™ä¸€ä¸‹ï¼Œç„¶åå†çœ‹æˆ‘ä¸‹é¢çš„è®²è§£ã€‚æ•´ä½“ä¸Šæ¥è®²ï¼Œè¿™ä¸ªå°ç¨‹åºå®ç°èµ·æ¥å¹¶ä¸å¤æ‚ã€‚æˆ‘å†™äº†ä¸€ç§å®ç°æ€è·¯ï¼Œå¦‚ä¸‹æ‰€ç¤ºï¼š

public class InputText {
  private StringBuilder text = new StringBuilder();

  public String getText() {
    return text.toString();
  }

  public void append(String input) {
    text.append(input);
  }

  public void setText(String text) {
    this.text.replace(0, this.text.length(), text);
  }
}

public class SnapshotHolder {
  private Stack<InputText> snapshots = new Stack<>();

  public InputText popSnapshot() {
    return snapshots.pop();
  }

  public void pushSnapshot(InputText inputText) {
    InputText deepClonedInputText = new InputText();
    deepClonedInputText.setText(inputText.getText());
    snapshots.push(deepClonedInputText);
  }
}

public class ApplicationMain {
  public static void main(String[] args) {
    InputText inputText = new InputText();
    SnapshotHolder snapshotsHolder = new SnapshotHolder();
    Scanner scanner = new Scanner(System.in);
    while (scanner.hasNext()) {
      String input = scanner.next();
      if (input.equals(":list")) {
        System.out.println(inputText.getText());
      } else if (input.equals(":undo")) {
        InputText snapshot = snapshotsHolder.popSnapshot();
        inputText.setText(snapshot.getText());
      } else {
        snapshotsHolder.pushSnapshot(inputText);
        inputText.append(input);
      }
    }
  }
}

å®é™…ä¸Šï¼Œå¤‡å¿˜å½•æ¨¡å¼çš„å®ç°å¾ˆçµæ´»ï¼Œä¹Ÿæ²¡æœ‰å¾ˆå›ºå®šçš„å®ç°æ–¹å¼ï¼Œåœ¨ä¸åŒçš„ä¸šåŠ¡éœ€æ±‚ã€ä¸åŒç¼–ç¨‹è¯­è¨€ä¸‹ï¼Œä»£ç å®ç°å¯èƒ½éƒ½ä¸å¤§ä¸€æ ·ã€‚ä¸Šé¢çš„ä»£ç åŸºæœ¬ä¸Šå·²ç»å®ç°äº†æœ€åŸºæœ¬çš„å¤‡å¿˜å½•çš„åŠŸèƒ½ã€‚ä½†æ˜¯ï¼Œå¦‚æœæˆ‘ä»¬æ·±ç©¶ä¸€ä¸‹çš„è¯ï¼Œè¿˜æœ‰ä¸€äº›é—®é¢˜è¦è§£å†³ï¼Œé‚£å°±æ˜¯å‰é¢å®šä¹‰ä¸­æåˆ°çš„ç¬¬äºŒç‚¹ï¼šè¦åœ¨ä¸è¿èƒŒå°è£…åŸåˆ™çš„å‰æä¸‹ï¼Œè¿›è¡Œå¯¹è±¡çš„å¤‡ä»½å’Œæ¢å¤ã€‚è€Œä¸Šé¢çš„ä»£ç å¹¶ä¸æ»¡è¶³è¿™ä¸€ç‚¹ï¼Œä¸»è¦ä½“ç°åœ¨ä¸‹é¢ä¸¤æ–¹é¢ï¼š

  • ç¬¬ä¸€ï¼Œä¸ºäº†èƒ½ç”¨å¿«ç…§æ¢å¤InputTextå¯¹è±¡ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬åœ¨InputTextç±»ä¸­å®šä¹‰äº†setText()å‡½æ•°ï¼Œä½†è¿™ä¸ªå‡½æ•°æœ‰å¯èƒ½ä¼šè¢«å…¶ä»–ä¸šåŠ¡ä½¿ç”¨ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥ï¼Œæš´éœ²ä¸åº”è¯¥æš´éœ²çš„å‡½æ•°è¿èƒŒäº†å°è£…åŸåˆ™ï¼›
  • ç¬¬äºŒï¼Œå¿«ç…§æœ¬èº«æ˜¯ä¸å¯å˜çš„ï¼Œç†è®ºä¸Šè®²ï¼Œä¸åº”è¯¥åŒ…å«ä»»ä½•set()ç­‰ä¿®æ”¹å†…éƒ¨çŠ¶æ€çš„å‡½æ•°ï¼Œä½†åœ¨ä¸Šé¢çš„ä»£ç å®ç°ä¸­ï¼Œâ€œå¿«ç…§â€œè¿™ä¸ªä¸šåŠ¡æ¨¡å‹å¤ç”¨äº†InputTextç±»çš„å®šä¹‰ï¼Œè€ŒInputTextç±»æœ¬èº«æœ‰ä¸€ç³»åˆ—ä¿®æ”¹å†…éƒ¨çŠ¶æ€çš„å‡½æ•°ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥ï¼Œç”¨InputTextç±»æ¥è¡¨ç¤ºå¿«ç…§è¿èƒŒäº†å°è£…åŸåˆ™ã€‚

é’ˆå¯¹ä»¥ä¸Šé—®é¢˜ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬å¯¹ä»£ç åšä¸¤ç‚¹ä¿®æ”¹ã€‚å…¶ä¸€ï¼Œå®šä¹‰ä¸€ä¸ªç‹¬ç«‹çš„ç±»ï¼ˆSnapshotç±»ï¼‰æ¥è¡¨ç¤ºå¿«ç…§ï¼Œè€Œä¸æ˜¯å¤ç”¨InputTextç±»ã€‚è¿™ä¸ªç±»åªæš´éœ²get()æ–¹æ³•ï¼Œæ²¡æœ‰set()ç­‰ä»»ä½•ä¿®æ”¹å†…éƒ¨çŠ¶æ€çš„æ–¹æ³•ã€‚å…¶äºŒï¼Œåœ¨InputTextç±»ä¸­ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬æŠŠsetText()æ–¹æ³•é‡å‘½åä¸ºrestoreSnapshot()æ–¹æ³•ï¼Œç”¨æ„æ›´åŠ æ˜ç¡®ï¼Œåªç”¨æ¥æ¢å¤å¯¹è±¡ã€‚

æŒ‰ç…§è¿™ä¸ªæ€è·¯ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬å¯¹ä»£ç è¿›è¡Œé‡æ„ã€‚é‡æ„ä¹‹åçš„ä»£ç å¦‚ä¸‹æ‰€ç¤ºï¼š

public class InputText {
  private StringBuilder text = new StringBuilder();

  public String getText() {
    return text.toString();
  }

  public void append(String input) {
    text.append(input);
  }

  public Snapshot createSnapshot() {
    return new Snapshot(text.toString());
  }

  public void restoreSnapshot(Snapshot snapshot) {
    this.text.replace(0, this.text.length(), snapshot.getText());
  }
}

public class Snapshot {
  private String text;

  public Snapshot(String text) {
    this.text = text;
  }

  public String getText() {
    return this.text;
  }
}

public class SnapshotHolder {
  private Stack<Snapshot> snapshots = new Stack<>();

  public Snapshot popSnapshot() {
    return snapshots.pop();
  }

  public void pushSnapshot(Snapshot snapshot) {
    snapshots.push(snapshot);
  }
}

public class ApplicationMain {
  public static void main(String[] args) {
    InputText inputText = new InputText();
    SnapshotHolder snapshotsHolder = new SnapshotHolder();
    Scanner scanner = new Scanner(System.in);
    while (scanner.hasNext()) {
      String input = scanner.next();
      if (input.equals(":list")) {
        System.out.println(inputText.toString());
      } else if (input.equals(":undo")) {
        Snapshot snapshot = snapshotsHolder.popSnapshot();
        inputText.restoreSnapshot(snapshot);
      } else {
        snapshotsHolder.pushSnapshot(inputText.createSnapshot());
        inputText.append(input);
      }
    }
  }
}

å®é™…ä¸Šï¼Œä¸Šé¢çš„ä»£ç å®ç°å°±æ˜¯å…¸å‹çš„å¤‡å¿˜å½•æ¨¡å¼çš„ä»£ç å®ç°ï¼Œä¹Ÿæ˜¯å¾ˆå¤šä¹¦ç±ï¼ˆåŒ…æ‹¬GoFçš„ã€Šè®¾è®¡æ¨¡å¼ã€‹ï¼‰ä¸­ç»™å‡ºçš„å®ç°æ–¹æ³•ã€‚

ä¸¤ä¸ªç–‘é—®ï¼š
class InputTextï¼š ä¸ºä»€ä¹ˆè¦æœ‰setTextæ–¹æ³•ï¼Œä»¥åŠä¸ºä»€ä¹ˆä½¿ç”¨replace (this.text.replace(0, this.text.length(), text);) è€Œä¸æ˜¯ç›´æ¥æ›¿æ¢ this.text = new StringBuilder(text)

if (input.equals(":undo")) { InputText snapshot = snapshotsHolder.popSnapshot(); inputText.setText(snapshot.getText()); }

è¿™é‡Œæ˜¯ä¸æ˜¯å¯ä»¥ç›´æ¥ä½¿ç”¨ inputText = snapshotsHolder.popSnapshot();


static class InputText {
private StringBuilder text = new StringBuilder();
public String getText() {
return text.toString();
}
public void append(String input) {
text.append(input);
}
// ç§»é™¤setæ–¹æ³•
}
static class SnapshotHolder {
private Stack<InputText> snapshots = new Stack <>();
public InputText popSnapshot() {
return snapshots.pop();
}
public void pushSnapshot(InputText inputText) {
InputText deepCloneInputText = new InputText();
deepCloneInputText.append(inputText.getText());
snapshots.push(deepCloneInputText);
}
}
public static void main(String[] args) {
InputText inputText = new InputText();
SnapshotHolder snapshotHolder = new SnapshotHolder();
Scanner scanner = new Scanner(System.in);
while (scanner.hasNext()) {
String input = scanner.next();
if (input.equals(":list")) {
System.out.println(inputText.getText());
} else if (input.equals(":undo")) {
inputText = snapshotHolder.popSnapshot();
// ç›´æ¥æ›¿æ¢
} else {
snapshotHolder.pushSnapshot(inputText);
inputText.append(input);
}
}
}
